content: {"locationId": "11117", "organizationId": "8653", "name": "Center Ridge Food Pantry", "address1": "5705 Hwy 9", "address2": "", "city": "Center Ridge", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "72027", "country": null, "phone": "501-208-2081", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "35.3704803", "longitude": "-92.5644533", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Center Ridge Food Pantry a nonprofit 501(3)C organization created to assist the people of the community and the surrounding areas with the issue of hunger.  We strive to provide them with nutritious food and other personal items that become available to us.  We are a non-denominational pantry.   We are located at the corner of Highways 9 & 124, in Center Ridge and is open on the 2nd & 4th Tuesdays from 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. each month.  We are a USDA distribution site.   ", "notes": "We are a drive -thru pantry, we ask that you stay in your cars, unless otherwise instructed.  We ask that you come with your cars empty enough to receive your box of groceries.  It always a good idea to bring your own boxes or to put a clothes basket in your car for your groceries, this is because at times we do not have an adequate number of boxes.      ", "contactName": "Mary Miller", "contactPhone": "501-208-2081", "contactEmail": "miller4465@att.net", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 72, "regionName": "Arkansas Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1c4a6bd3-8e23-4c7c-b75a-6bd6f5204146.png", "website": "https://arkansasfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
